dc_creator_sm: University of Michigan. China Data Center.
dc_description_s: REMOTE DOWNLOAD NOT AVAILABLE - please contact data@library.columbia.edu for access. The Atlas of Religions in China is a opoint theme representing a total of about 70,000 religious sites (Buddhism, Taoism, Christianity, Muslim, and others) on Mainland China. Each site includes site name, address, contact information, County GB Code, postcode, starting year, primary activities, and employee scale.
